cyclepaintings-fabric.duskconfig.title: Cycle Paintings Config
cyclepaintings-fabric.duskconfig.DESC_ig: Split by a , (comma). The paintings to ignore during the cycle. You can either input an entire mod's prefix (only the part before the : (colon)) or the entire line found via 'showRegisteredPaintingsDebug'.
cyclepaintings-fabric.duskconfig.ignoreP: Ignore Paintings In Cycle Resource Location
cyclepaintings-fabric.duskconfig.DESC_sh: When enabled, prints all paintings registered to the console. With this you can find which to add to the 'ignorePaintingsInCycleResourceLocationPrefix' config.
